cookies_consent_text: We use cookies to improve your experience on our website. By continuing to browse, you agree to the use of cookies. To find out more, see our Privacy Policy.
email_sended: Our system includes a feature that sends email updates for order status changes. However, I've decided not to allow the input of personal data at this time. This means you won't be able to see the email functionality in action. But, you can get a glimpse of how it works by checking out the code in the API repository.
emptyCart: Your cart is empty. Add some items to start shopping!
name: Name
payment_type_detail_CreditCard: Due to the Mercado Pago integration being in development mode and not in production, the credit card used will be fixed as specified in the documentation to ensure the purchase is approved.
payment_type_detail_Invoice: Due to the Mercado Pago integration being in development mode and not in production, neither a boleto will be generated nor approved, and the same applies to PIX payments. Would you like to see it working? Contact me at gneri94@gmail.com
payment_type_detail_PIX: Due to the Mercado Pago integration being in development mode and not in production, neither a boleto will be generated nor approved, and the same applies to PIX payments. Would you like to see it working? Contact me at gneri94@gmail.com
sorry_message: Apologies for not having this feature enabled. For security and priority reasons, I have decided to keep several data points mocked for now. This will eventually be resolved and made available.
